description.value: Inline edit toolbar becomes active on stage when adding or focusing on Heading

comment.userInput: When click outside heading heading input loses focus, toolbar disappears, and placeholder displays Enter Heading Text
When click inside heading see heading input gain focus, placeholder disappears and WYSIWYG toolbar appears

description.value: Edit Heading Type field to value H1 on stage and view the rendered content type in stage and storefront.

comment.userInput: Edit heading text inline on stage for default alignment
Default alignment should have no alignment selected
Validate Default alignment and selected heading type and text persist in Edit Panel
Validate Left alignment and selected heading type and text persist in Edit Panel
Validate Center alignment and selected heading type and text persist in Edit Panel
Validate Right alignment and selected heading type and text persist in Edit Panel

title.value: Stage Edit - Heading Toolbar Buttons Can Wrap

description.value: Inline edit toolbar button items can wrap on multiple lines when in a one-sixth column

comment.userInput: Stage: Check toolbar buttons have wrapped

title.value: Stage Edit - Heading Non Breaking Space

description.value: Add non breaking space on stage and view the rendered content type in stage and storefront.

comment.userInput: Edit heading text inline on stage
Stage: Check NBSP in heading after save
